queries.active_members:
-- SQL template for *single-member* active check or single-member candidate fetch.
-- Use a placeholder {member_type} or {email_pattern} as needed.
-- This template will be transformed by the LLM for batching (IN lists) by the framework.
-- Example (Oracle):
-- SELECT MEMBER_ID, USER_NO, EMAIL FROM MY_OWNER.MEMBER_MASTER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE = '{member_type}' AND EXIT_DATE IS NULL AND EMAIL LIKE '{email_pattern}' ORDER BY NVL(LAST_UPDATED, CREATED_DATE) DESC

SELECT MEMBER_ID, USER_NO, EMAIL FROM ${OWNER}.${TABLE} WHERE MEMBER_TYPE = '{member_type}' AND EXIT_DATE IS NULL AND EMAIL LIKE '{email_pattern}' ORDER BY ${ORDER_BY}
queries.registered_members:
-- SQL template to check registration for ONE member (single USER_NO placeholder {user_no}).
-- LLM will be asked to convert to batch form (checking multiple user_no values); if LLM unavailable the framework will create an IN(...) variant.
-- Example (Oracle):
-- SELECT USER_NO FROM MY_OWNER.OKTA_USERS WHERE USER_NO = '{user_no}' AND REGISTERED_FLAG = 'Y'

SELECT USER_NO FROM ${OKTA_OWNER}.${OKTA_TABLE} WHERE USER_NO = '{user_no}' AND ${OKTA_REGISTERED_FLAG_COL} = '{OKTA_REGISTERED_FLAG_VALUE}'
